DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness of oral labetalol and oral nifedipine for management of postpartum hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Tab.Labetalol and Tab.Nifedipine for Management of Postpartum Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: A comparison of oral labetalol and oral nifedipine for management of postpartum hypertension. Which drug is more effective in lowering blood pressures in patient with postpartum hypertension.
DOC.criteria: all women with postpartum hypertension as a continuation of pregnancy induced hypertension,eclampsia, preeclampsia or new onset denovo postpartum hypertension,of any parity. age group between 1848. after informed consent. all women with chronic hypertension, uncontrolled and un treated medical disorders will be excluded. conditions in which drugs labetalol and nifedipine is contraindicated.
